ygData.subject: Re: Feign Death
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry to disagree with you but the flame goblins I let go back to thier spots were in no way in line of sight and neither were the Dar froggies my friend
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry to disagree with you but the flame goblins I let go back to thier
spots were in no way in line of sight and neither were the Dar froggies my
friend experimented with.
----- Original Message -----
From: Sheldon Jolson <Sheldon_Jolson@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 7:31 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Feign Death


> From: "Sheldon Jolson" <Sheldon_Jolson@...>
>
>
>
> I experimented at found they only came back if they could see me. After
> consulting
> with a GM, I pretty much confirmed that it is a line of sight nerf. Feign
> pulling a mob
> around the corner should be possible, though I have not specifically tried
it.
>
>
> I am suprised it hasn't started already. I just wanted to share with you
my Post
> nerf FD experimentaion.
>
> Sol A green Flame goblins. the goblins I was experimenting with were on
the
> floor near the passage to where the Foreman spawns. I succesfully feigned
them
> at this point. they returned to thier spawn points . I stood up they
immediatly
> came back. so I feign again they return to thier points I get up and run
all
> the way to the small bridge type thing near the sol b spawn point. I fd
again.
> I was several mins stand up wait a few and here they come a running at me.
I fd
> again let them walk away. get up and they come back.
>
> A fellow monk on my server experimented in Lguk with some Dar Undead frogs
and
> had similar results even after 5 mins of feign time.
>
> >
